name: Mucobega Hotel
description: {'Location': ['It is located in Sarandë, Albania.'], 'Facilities & Services': ['Accommodation: Air-conditioned rooms featuring private bathrooms, flat-screen TVs, and private balconies with sea or garden views.', 'Dining: An on-site restaurant serving a variety of dishes, complemented by a beach bar offering refreshing beverages.', 'Amenities: A seasonal outdoor swimming pool, a well-maintained garden, and a sun terrace for relaxation.', 'Additional Services: Free Wi-Fi throughout the property, a 24-hour front desk, and free private parking.'], 'Nearby Attractions': ['Lekursi Castle: Located about 4.2 km from the hotel, offering panoramic views of the city and coastline.', 'Port of Sarandë: Approximately 1.8 km away, providing access to ferries and boat tours.']}
short_description: Mucobega Hotel is beachfront hotel in Sarandë with modern rooms, a private beach, and great amenities.

name: Hotel JoAn
